DESCRIPTION: 
Developers from FROM SOFTWARE give you Dark Souls Ã¢â€žÂ¢ II - the long-awaited continuation of the acclaimed hit in 2011 - the game Dark Souls. This is a unique role-playing game of the old school, conquered the players around the world. Here you will find the most difficult test and an incredible sense of satisfaction. Dark Souls II brings the traditional series of high level of sophistication and innovative gameplay in single-player and in the collective game. Begin your journey in which you are waiting for Undefeated, diabolical traps and insurmountable danger - all the things you expect from FROM SOFTWARE. 

Crown of the Sunken King - plot supplement for the original Dark Souls Ã¢â€žÂ¢ II. It adds to the game of new enemies and new locations. In the story, the player learns how the main character goes to a long-lost city, in order to regain the crown of the king. 

Crown of the Old Iron King - this is just another addition to the furious action / role-playing game Dark Souls 2. It will take you to a huge tower enclosed by a black fog and hides in its bosom fire, smoke and magic. Will secure the crown of Old Iron King and walk in the ways that are not what they seem. 

Crown of the Ivory King - this is the third and final addition to Dark Souls Ã¢â€žÂ¢ II. The action will unfold in an ancient temple surrounded by towering walls and absorbed gaping emptiness where raging ice storm. You have to fight with the forces hidden from the eyes, and using the magic of the cold, as well as esoteric abilities. 

Features: 
Death - is not the end: immerse yourself in an exciting game in the vast world on a new engine with a radically new stunning graphics, sound and special effects. 
Maze of monsters and bosses: a dizzying journey into worlds filled with bizarre monsters and deadly bosses, which could only come up with the imagination of the developers "From Software" 
Touch Attack: A wide range of threats aimed at activation of human fears and phobias: auditory hallucinations, dizziness, vertigo, etc. 
Further and deeper: Additional settings allow you to change weapons and armor for your style of play 
Expansion of multiplayer games: updated multiplayer games improves communication online and open a new level of playing together and playing against each other. 
Thoughtful gameplay: Dark Souls Ã¢â€žÂ¢ II - a smooth motion technology "motion capture", improved fighting system, significantly increased the number of characters, enhanced self-tuning, new weapons, armor and balanced system of characters.
